Description:
Notice I/HW/FSL/230322/01 / 312384716 - IN served - You have failed to ensure that exposure of your employees to substances hazardous to health, namely mild steel welding fume, is either prevented or, where this is not reasonably practicable, adequately

Notice P/HW/FSl/230322/01 / 312389792 - PN served - You have failed to take effective measures to prevent access to the dangerous closing tools of the Wakefield Rhodes power press, No. 168, in that access is possible in the gaps of the fixed guarding to the side of the tool bed.

Notice P/HW/FSL/230322/02 / 312389802 - PN served - You have failed to take effective measures to prevent access to the dangerous closing tools of the Udal power press, Ref U31013, in that access is possible in the openings to the front of the fixed guarding around of the tool bed.

Notice P/HW/FSL/230322/03 / 312389810 - PN served - You have failed to take effective measures to prevent access to the dangerous closing tools of the Bentley G12 power press, machine 478, in that access to the tools whilst in use is possible through openings in the fixed guarding surrounding the tool bed of the machine.
